name: Chipotle Pork Naanwich
author: Babbs
summary: I created this while trying to use up leftovers. It is made with pork cutlets, but any meat would be good. Use any toppings you would like.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine mayonnaise with diced chipotle pepper in a small bowl; mix well to make chipotle mayonnaise
Place pork cutlets and naan bread on separate baking sheets
Heat pork cutlets in the preheated oven until warmed through, about 5 minutes
Top each cutlet with 1 slice of cheese and continue to heat until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes
Warm naan in the preheated oven until softened, about 5 minutes
Spread chipotle mayonnaise over each naan bread; place a pork cutlet on top
Top with shredded lettuce and green onions; fold sides of naan over pork
